mksourcedir

chezmoi managed
cmpenv -text stdout golden/managed

[short] stop

chezmoi managed --include=all
cmpenv -text stdout golden/managed-all

chezmoi managed --include=absent
cmpenv -text stdout golden/managed-absent

chezmoi managed --include=dirs
cmpenv -text stdout golden/managed-dirs

chezmoi managed --include=files
cmpenv -text stdout golden/managed-files

chezmoi managed --include=symlinks
cmpenv -text stdout golden/managed-symlinks

-- golden/managed --
$HOME${/}.bashrc
$HOME${/}.binary
$HOME${/}.gitconfig
$HOME${/}.hushlogin
$HOME${/}.ssh
$HOME${/}.ssh${/}config
$HOME${/}.symlink
-- golden/managed-all --
$HOME${/}.absent
$HOME${/}.bashrc
$HOME${/}.binary
$HOME${/}.gitconfig
$HOME${/}.hushlogin
$HOME${/}.ssh
$HOME${/}.ssh${/}config
$HOME${/}.symlink
-- golden/managed-absent --
$HOME${/}.absent
-- golden/managed-dirs --
$HOME${/}.ssh
-- golden/managed-files --
$HOME${/}.bashrc
$HOME${/}.binary
$HOME${/}.gitconfig
$HOME${/}.hushlogin
$HOME${/}.ssh${/}config
-- golden/managed-symlinks --
$HOME${/}.symlink
